= User stories =
 * [UserStoryShowYourFriends Show your friends]
 * [UserStoryRemoveFriend Remove existing friend]

= Layout =

== Header ==
 * Cool coders logo (left aligned)
 * Link to [PageEditProfile Edit profile] with username of current user (right aligned)
 * Link to [UserStoryLogout Logout] (right aligned)

== Bread crumb ==
 * Link "Home" to [PageShowMessages show message page]
 * Link "Your friends" with link to [PageShowFriends]

== Body ==
 # Table with entries of type [DomainModelUser user]
    # Sortable column "Username"
    # Sortable column "No. of posts" (Containing the post count of the user)
    # Column with the action [UserStoryRemoveFriend Unfollow]
 # A paging component displaying the amount of available pages, the current page and the number of all users the current user is following
 # A link "Search new friends" to page [PageSearchNewFriends Search new friends]
